body:
Hello everyone!

getinfo command does not input .bmp file, and I want to check the
resolution of a .bmp file converted from .hdr file using ra_bmp. Since
getinfo takes .hdr files, so my question is:

Does the resolution of .hdr and converted .bmp (using ra_bmp) remains same?

Thank you!

Best regards,
Vaib
